GLOverlayUIÂ¶

GLOverlayUI is a desktop application that demonstrates the integration of a real-time OpenGL rendering pipeline with a native wxWidgets GUI.

It features an interactive 2D scene rendered on a wxGLCanvas, including a clickable OpenGL overlay and a dynamic control panel using native UI widgets.

FeaturesÂ¶

    • wxSlider to control object rotation or scale

    • wxCheckBox to toggle visibility of scene objects

  • ğŸ§¼ Clean separation between rendering engine and UI logic

  • ğŸ” Real-time interaction between OpenGL scene and native UI

Build Instructions (Linux)Â¶

Prerequisites

Install required system packages:

>  cmake build-essential libwxgtk3.0-gtk3-dev libgl1-mesa-dev libglu1-mesa-dev

Build the Project

From the root of the repository:

cmake -B build
cmake --build build

The final executable will be located in the bin/ directory.

Run the ApplicationÂ¶

./bin/GLOverlayUI

DependenciesÂ¶

  • wxWidgets (GUI framework)

  • OpenGL (GL/GLU for 2D rendering)

  • CMake â‰¥ 3.11

Note

PNG loading is handled via wxImage â€“ no external image library is required.
